pomodoro.workCompleteBody: Time for a break. Great job staying focused!
pomodoro.breakCompleteBody: Ready to get back to work?

stats.title: Time Statistics
stats.startBrowsing: Start browsing and your time will be tracked here.
stats.weeklyDesc: Track your browsing time across different periods
stats.browseToSee: Browse some websites to see your time tracking data

blockedSites.title: Blocked Sites
blockedSites.addDesc: Enter a domain or URL pattern to block (e.g., youtube.com/shorts, x.com)
blockedSites.addFirstSite: Add your first site above to start blocking distractions
blockedSites.noSitesInCategory: No sites in this category yet
blockedSites.defaultSitesProtected: Default sites are always hidden. They are blocked when this category is enabled.

contentFilters.title: Content Filters
contentFilters.description: Block specific content within websites without blocking the entire site
contentFilters.youtubeShortsDesc: Hides Shorts from YouTube - recommendations, sidebar, and redirects direct links
contentFilters.youtubeRecommendationsDesc: Hides homepage feed, sidebar recommendations, and end screen suggestions
contentFilters.youtubeCommentsDesc: Hides the comments section on all videos
contentFilters.instagramReelsDesc: Hides Reels tab and Reels content throughout Instagram
contentFilters.instagramStoriesDesc: Hides the Stories bar at the top of your feed
contentFilters.facebookReelsDesc: Hides the Watch tab, Reels, and video suggestions
contentFilters.facebookStoriesDesc: Hides Facebook Stories at the top of your feed
contentFilters.twitterForYouDesc: Hides the For You tab and keeps you on Following only
contentFilters.twitterExploreDesc: Hides Explore, What's Happening, and trending topics
contentFilters.redditPopularDesc: Hides r/popular and r/all, keeping you in your subreddits
contentFilters.tiktokForYouDesc: Redirects from For You to Following feed
contentFilters.twitchRecommendedDesc: Hides recommended channels and category suggestions
contentFilters.linkedinFeedDesc: Hides the main feed, keeping only messaging and jobs
contentFilters.snapchatStoriesDesc: Hides Stories, Spotlight, and Discover content

schedules.title: Blocking Schedules
schedules.description: Sites are only blocked during active schedule times
schedules.noSchedulesDesc: Without schedules, blocking is always active. Add a schedule to limit blocking to specific times.

friction.title: Friction
friction.description: Configure the delay and requirements for accessing friction-mode sites
friction.phraseHint: Users must type this phrase exactly to access the site
friction.bypassLimitedHint: After completing friction, access is granted for {minutes} minutes
friction.bypassUnlimitedHint: After completing friction, access is granted until tab closes

pomodoroSettings.durationsDesc: Customize your focus and break intervals
pomodoroSettings.autoStartBreaksDesc: Automatically start break timer when work session ends
pomodoroSettings.autoStartWorkDesc: Automatically start work timer when break ends
pomodoroSettings.blockDuringWorkDesc: Enable strict blocking during focus time
pomodoroSettings.overlayModeDesc: Show a floating timer on web pages

frictionOverlay.explanation: This site is in your friction list to help you stay focused.

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
